Name: sprint_capacity_limit
Description: The sum of story points for all user stories in a sprint must not exceed the team's velocity.

Name: project_budget_limit
Description: The total cost incurred must not exceed the project's allocated budget.

Name: worker_availability_check
Description: A worker can only be assigned to tasks if their availability is greater than zero.

Name: task_skill_requirement
Description: An assigned worker must possess the specific skill required to complete a task.

Name: agile_team_size
Description: The size of a development team must be between 3 and 9 members.

Name: sprint_timebox_enforced
Description: The end date of a sprint is fixed and must be strictly adhered to.

Name: blocked_task_halt
Description: A task's status cannot be 'done' if it has an associated blocker with a status of 'open'.

Name: team_scrum_master_assignment
Description: Every team must have exactly one Scrum Master assigned.

Name: feature_status_for_release
Description: A feature must have the status 'done' before it can be included in a release plan.

Name: mandatory_sprint_events
Description: Each sprint must include a Sprint Planning, Review, and Retrospective.

Name: user_story_epic_link
Description: Every user story must belong to exactly one epic.

Name: unique_worker_team_assignment
Description: A worker can only be a member of one team at any given time.
